name: Anisearch black transparent style
description: Black transparent design of Anisearch (The background-image is changeable)
additional_info:
0. Anisearch is blocking all Stylish and Stylebot Styles. I have found another extension, but I'm sure Anisearch also blocks this one if I mention it in the description. So the best way: Find another extension by yourself
0.1 You have to change the language in the first element in this CSS-Code (html[lang="your language"]).
If only the "body" is selected for the change, ads will also have this background because they also have a "body".

1. It is not sure that I have changed all things on the website. There might be some things that I have forgotten.

2. You can change the background. I have put some additional infos in the css code how/where to change it.

3. Sry no adblock anymore. The amdin of anisearch banned me because of this :/
